item.description:
Daylight Savings Time Night Flight! Yeahhhhh, let the Wednesday night flights begin with this flight to New Bedford. I's a great flight and we should catch a nice sunset on our return flight :-)

 

 

 

 

The Airport Grille is an intimate upscale American bistro framed within a modern architectural setting and a warm relaxing environment. We craft our fare using the freshest local ingredients and seafood. Our flavors are a combination of American and European savories; unique gastronomic creations balanced by seductive cocktails and interesting wines. Our extensive and carefully selected wine list compliments every dish to make your dining experience more enjoyable and memorable.

Blah Blah Blah..... We know all that. Just RSVP and get your tail down to KEWB with us...

 

 

 

 

 

Charley

 

Please remember to find yourself a seat in one of the planes attending if you're without wings. The comment section helps, but it's your responsibility to make us confirm. This organiser can't be the full tour guide.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Someone Say Scallops for Supper Night Flight!
